meanings.definition: A solid medical preparation in a roughly conical or cylindrical shape, designed to be inserted into the rectum or vagina to dissolve.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed suppositories to help with my stomach pain.
meanings.sent2: She inserted the suppositories into her rectum as directed by the pharmacist.
meanings.sent3: When the suppositories melted, they released the medicine to soothe the discomfort.
meanings.sent4: The suppositories were like tiny healing rockets launching into my body.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the suppositories working their magic deep inside me.
